build I20040318

Noticed this in my .log.  Not sure what triggered it.  I don't think I was doing
DnD from any of the marker views.  Perhaps the editor area one got triggered
somehow?

Bug 74692 could be a dupplicate of this one.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open one of the marker views (tasks, problems, or bookmarks).
2. Drag a marker into the editor area.

Writes this ClassCastException to the log.
*** Bug 74692 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

MarkerView was using the Table's selection provider rather than the (adapted)
one on the view itself.

Fixed in head (3.1 stream)
*** Bug 49358 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
